text: Christopher Philip Mitchell (21 July 1988 - 6 May 2016) was a Scottish professional footballer. Mitchell played for Falkirk, Ayr United, Bradford City, Queen of the South and Clyde. He was born in Stirling, Scotland. Mitchell won seven caps for the Scotland national under-21 football team. Mitchell died on 6 May 2016, aged 27. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Scotland stats at Scottish FA Category:1988 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Footballers from Stirling
title: Chris Mitchell
